lines.text: create ints A1 , A2 and A3
read standard input to A1 , A2 and A3
declare integer variable with name l = square root of ( A1 * A2 / A3 )
lines.code: int l = ( int ) sqrt ( A1 * A2 / A3 ) ;

lines.text: declare integer variable b with value = square root of ( A3 * A1 / A2 )
lines.code: int b = ( int ) sqrt ( A3 * A1 / A2 ) ;

lines.text: create new integer called h = square root of ( A3 * A2 / A1 )
lines.code: int h = ( int ) sqrt ( A3 * A2 / A1 ) ;

lines.text: print 4 * ( l + b + h ) and " \ n "
